movie.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
movie.tagline: We had twenty years to prepare. So did they.
movie.overview: We always knew they were coming back. Using recovered alien technology, the nations of Earth have collaborated on an immense defense program to protect the planet. But nothing can prepare us for the aliens’ advanced and unprecedented force. Only the ingenuity of a few brave men and women can bring our world back from the brink of extinction.

movie.title: Justice League
movie.overview: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne and Diana Prince assemble a team of metahumans consisting of Barry Allen, Arthur Curry, and Victor Stone to face the catastrophic threat of Steppenwolf and the Parademons who are on the hunt for three Mother Boxes on Earth.

movie.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movie.overview: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his homeworld and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of an all-powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

movie.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
movie.overview: Having taken her first steps into a larger world in "Star Wars: The Force Awakens", Rey continues her epic journey with Finn, Poe and Luke Skywalker in the next chapter of the Star Wars saga.

movie.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movie.overview: As the Avengers and their allies have continued to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger has emerged from the cosmic shadows: Thanos. A despot of intergalactic infamy, his goal is to collect all six Infinity Stones, artifacts of unimaginable power, and use them to inflict his twisted will on all of reality. Everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment - the fate of Earth and existence itself has never been more uncertain.

movie.title: Avengers: Infinity War Part 2
movie.overview: Plot unknown.

movie.title: Avatar 2
movie.overview: Plot unknown.

movie.title: Aquaman
movie.overview: Arthur Curry learns that he is the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, and must step forward to lead his people and to be a hero to the world.

movie.title: Captain Marvel
movie.overview: Carol Danvers receives superpowers and becomes Captain Marvel.

movie.title: Flashpoint
movie.overview: The standalone film with The Flash taking place after Justice League.

movie.title: Jason Bourne
movie.tagline: You know his name
movie.overview: The most dangerous former operative of the CIA is drawn out of hiding to uncover hidden truths about his past.

movie.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
movie.tagline: Fire burns brighter in the darkness
movie.overview: Katniss Everdeen reluctantly becomes the symbol of a mass rebellion against the autocratic Capitol.

movie.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
movie.tagline: The fire will burn forever.
movie.overview: With the nation of Panem in a full scale war, Katniss confronts President Snow in the final showdown. Teamed with a group of her closest friends – including Gale, Finnick, and Peeta – Katniss goes off on a mission with the unit from District 13 as they risk their lives to stage an assassination attempt on President Snow who has become increasingly obsessed with destroying her. The mortal traps, enemies, and moral choices that await Katniss will challenge her more than any arena she faced in The Hunger Games.

movie.title: Deadpool 2
movie.overview: Plot unknown.

movie.title: Big Hero 6
movie.tagline: From the creators of Wreck-it Ralph and Frozen
movie.overview: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

movie.title: Interstellar
movie.tagline: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.
movie.overview: Interstellar chronicles the adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.

movie.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
movie.overview: Ant-Man joins forces with the Wasp.

movie.title: The Hobbit: The Tolkien Edit
movie.tagline: "So it is true. The editors' blade found its mark."
movie.overview: This is a rigorously edited version of Peter Jackson’s Hobbit trilogy, which more closely resembles J.R.R. Tolkien’s original novel. All three movies (An Unexpected Journey, The Desolation of Smaug & The Battle of the Five Armies) have been condensed in a single 4-hour feature. This new version was achieved through a series of major and minor cuts, including: the investigation of Dol Guldor; the Tauriel-Legolas-Kili love triangle; the Pale Orc subplot (trimmed down); several of the Laketown scenes; the prelude with old Bilbo; several of the orc skirmishes; and several of the action scenes (tightened up). The main goals of this edit were to re-centre the story on Bilbo, and to have the narrative move at a much brisker pace. It is important that the audience feels a sense of urgency to the quest, imbuing every conflict (the goblins, the spiders, the woodelves) with an extra level of tension, as the Dwarves' homeland, their heritage, their future, dwindles with the setting sun.

movie.title: Star Trek
movie.tagline: The future begins.
movie.overview: The fate of the galaxy rests in the hands of bitter rivals. One, James Kirk, is a delinquent, thrill-seeking Iowa farm boy. The other, Spock, a Vulcan, was raised in a logic-based society that rejects all emotion. As fiery instinct clashes with calm reason, their unlikely but powerful partnership is the only thing capable of leading their crew through unimaginable danger, boldly going where no one has gone before. The human adventure has begun again.

movie.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
movie.tagline: Return to magic. Return to hope. Return to Narnia.
movie.overview: This time around Edmund and Lucy Pevensie, along with their pesky cousin Eustace Scrubb find themselves swallowed into a painting and on to a fantastic Narnian ship headed for the very edges of the world.

movie.title: Sherlock Holmes 3
movie.overview: The upcoming sequel in the Sherlock Holmes franchise. Director Guy Ritchie returning for this film as well.

movie.title: Star Trek: First Contact
movie.tagline: Resistance is futile.
movie.overview: The Borg, a relentless race of cyborgs, are on a direct course for Earth. Violating orders to stay away from the battle, Captain Picard and the crew of the newly-commissioned USS Enterprise E pursue the Borg back in time to prevent the invaders from changing Federation history and assimilating the galaxy.

movie.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
movie.tagline: Evil Must Be Confronted.
movie.overview: Returning for his fifth year of study at Hogwarts, Harry is stunned to find that his warnings about the return of Lord Voldemort have been ignored. Left with no choice, Harry takes matters into his own hands, training a small group of students – dubbed 'Dumbledore's Army' – to defend themselves against the dark arts.

movie.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon: Sword of Destiny
movie.tagline: The past returns with a vengeance.
movie.overview: A story of lost love, young love, a legendary sword and one last opportunity at redemption.

movie.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
movie.tagline: Reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated
movie.overview: When an attack on the Kingsman headquarters takes place and a new villain rises, Eggsy and Merlin are forced to work together with the American agency known as the Statesman to save the world.

movie.title: Inception
movie.tagline: Your mind is the scene of the crime.
movie.overview: Cobb, a skilled thief who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible: "inception", the implantation of another person's idea into a target's subconscious.

movie.title: Beauty and the Beast
movie.tagline: Be our guest.
movie.overview: A live-action adaptation of Disney's version of the classic 'Beauty and the Beast' tale of a cursed prince and a beautiful young woman who helps him break the spell.

movie.title: Blade Runner 2049
movie.overview: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

movie.title: Arrival
movie.tagline: Why are they here?
movie.overview: Taking place after alien crafts land around the world, an expert linguist is recruited by the military to determine whether they come in peace or are a threat.

movie.title: Black Panther
movie.overview: T'Challa, the new ruler of the advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must defend his land from being torn apart by enemies from outside and inside the country.

movie.title: Flying Swords of Dragon Gate
movie.tagline: Jet Li and Tsui Hark are back together.
movie.overview: Flying Swords of Dragon Gate picks up three years after the infamous Dragon Inn was burnt down in the desert when its innkeeper Jade vanished. A new gang of marauders had taken over - innkeepers by day and treasure hunters by night. The inn is the rumoured location of a lost city buried under the desert, and its hidden treasure would only be revealed by a gigantic storm every 60 years. The gang used the inn as a front to locate the lost treasure.

movie.title: Frozen 2
movie.overview: Sequel to Disney's Frozen, currently in development.

movie.title: Shazam!
movie.overview: Young Billy Batson finds himself gifted with the power of the wizard Shazam to fight against the forces of evil. With the wisdom of Solomon, the strength of Hercules, the stamina of Atlas, the power of Zeus, the courage of Achilles and speed of Mercury, he is the holder of the power of S.H.A.Z.A.M; he is Captain Marvel.

movie.title: The Accountant
movie.tagline: Calculate your choices.
movie.overview: As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client, the Treasury Department closes in on his activities and the body count starts to rise.

movie.title: Despicable Me 3
movie.tagline: Oh brother.
movie.overview: Gru and his wife Lucy must stop former '80s child star Balthazar Bratt from achieving world domination.

movie.title: Gravity
movie.tagline: Don't Let Go
movie.overview: Dr. Ryan Stone, a brilliant medical engineer on her first Shuttle mission, with veteran astronaut Matt Kowalsky in command of his last flight before retiring. But on a seemingly routine spacewalk, disaster strikes. The Shuttle is destroyed, leaving Stone and Kowalsky completely alone-tethered to nothing but each other and spiraling out into the blackness of space. The deafening silence tells them they have lost any link to Earth and any chance for rescue. As fear turns to panic, every gulp of air eats away at what little oxygen is left. But the only way home may be to go further out into the terrifying expanse of space.

movie.title: Murder on the Orient Express
movie.tagline: Everyone is a suspect
movie.overview: Genius Belgian detective Hercule Poirot investigates the murder of an American tycoon aboard the Orient Express train.

movie.title: Toy Story 4
movie.overview: Woody and Buzz Lightyear set out on an epic journey to find Woody's romantic interest, Bo Peep.

movie.title: Green Lantern Corps
movie.overview: A group of humans join the Green Lantern Corps, an alien interstellar police force that protects the universe.

movie.title: Justice League 2
movie.overview: A sequel to Justice League (2017).

movie.title: X-Men Origins: Magneto
movie.overview: A look at the early life of Eric Lensherr and his friendship with Charles Xavier, and how the one-time allies became mortal enemies.

movie.title: X-Men: Dark Phoenix
movie.overview: Gathered together by Professor Charles Xavier to protect a world that fears and hates them, the X-Men had fought many battles, been on adventures that spanned galaxies, grappled enemies of limitless might, but none of this could prepare them for the most shocking struggle they would ever face. One of their own members, Jean Grey, has gained power beyond all comprehension, and that power has corrupted her absolutely! Now they must decide if the life of the woman they cherish is worth the existence of the entire universe!

movie.title: The Bourne Legacy
movie.tagline: There Was Never Just One
movie.overview: New CIA operative, Aaron Cross experiences life-or-death stakes that have been triggered by the previous actions of Jason Bourne.

movie.title: Ocean's Eight
movie.overview: Crime caper story involving eight female thieves.

movie.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 2
movie.overview: Gellert Grindelwald has escaped imprisonment and has begun gathering followers to his cause—elevating wizards above all non-magical beings. The only one capable of putting a stop to him is the wizard he once called his closest friend, Albus Dumbledore. However, Dumbledore will need to seek help from the wizard who had thwarted Grindelwald once before, his former student Newt Scamander.

movie.title: Tomb Raider
movie.overview: Lara Croft , the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she finds herself on the island where her father disappeared.

movie.title: The LEGO Ninjago Movie
movie.overview: Six young ninjas are tasked with defending their island home of Ninjago. By night, they’re gifted warriors using their skill and awesome fleet of vehicles to fight villains and monsters. By day, they’re ordinary teens struggling against their greatest enemy....high school.

show.title: Star Trek: Discovery
show.overview: Set roughly ten years before the events of the original Star Trek, the series follows the crew of the USS Discovery as they discover new worlds and civilizations, while exploring the franchise's signature contemporary themes. The season-long story line revolves around an incident and an event in Star Trek history that's been talked about but never been explored.

movie.title: My Little Pony: The Movie
movie.tagline: Friendship Comes in Many Colors
movie.overview: A new dark force threatens Ponyville, and the Mane 6 – Twilight Sparkle, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie, Fluttershy and Rarity – embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria where they meet new friends and exciting challenges on a quest to use the magic of friendship and save their home.

movie.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
movie.tagline: For one world to live, the other must die.
movie.overview: Autobots and Decepticons are at war, with humans on the sidelines. Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving our future lies buried in the secrets of the past, in the hidden history of Transformers on Earth.

show.title: Inhumans
show.overview: The epic story of the royal family including Black Bolt, the enigmatic, commanding King of the Inhumans, with a voice so powerful that the slightest whisper can destroy a city. After the Royal Family of Inhumans is splintered by a military coup, they barely escape to Hawaii where their surprising interactions with the lush world and humanity around them may prove to not only save them, but Earth itself.

movie.title: The Incredibles 2
movie.overview: Upcoming sequel to the popular animated movie The Incredibles.

movie.title: The Incredible Hulk
movie.tagline: You'll like him when he's angry.
movie.overview: Scientist Bruce Banner scours the planet for an antidote to the unbridled force of rage within him: the Hulk. But when the military masterminds who dream of exploiting his powers force him back to civilization, he finds himself coming face to face with a new, deadly foe.

movie.title: Tron
movie.tagline: A world inside the computer where man has never been.  Until now.
movie.overview: As Kevin Flynn searches for proof that he invented a hit video game, he is "digitalized" by a laser and finds himself inside The Grid, where programs suffer under the tyrannical rule of the Master Control Program. With the help of TRON, a security program, Flynn seeks to free The Grid from the MCP.

movie.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
movie.overview: The tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into Jumanji's world - pitted against rhinos, black mambas and an endless variety of jungle traps and puzzles. To survive, they'll play as characters from the game.

show.title: The Orville
show.overview: A space adventure series set 400 years in the future that follows The Orville, a mid-level exploratory spaceship. Its crew, both human and alien, face the wonders and dangers of outer space, while also dealing with the familiar, often humorous problems of everyday life.

movie.title: Gambit
movie.overview: Channing Tatum stars as Remy LeBeau, aka Gambit, the Cajun Mutant with a knack for cards.

movie.title: The Adventures of Tintin: Prisoners of the Sun
movie.overview: Professor Calculus is kidnapped, and it is up to Tintin and his faithful companions to save the day.

movie.title: A Wrinkle in Time
movie.overview: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

movie.title: Han Solo: A Star Wars Story
movie.overview: The story is centered on a young Han Solo, the roguish smuggler who later meets Obi-Wan Kenobi and Luke Skywalker in the Mos Eisley Cantina.

movie.title: Ready Player One
movie.overview: When the creator of a popular video game system dies, a virtual contest is created to compete for his billions.

movie.title: The Batman
movie.overview: Batman makes his first stand-alone appearance in the DC Extended Universe.

show.title: Designated Survivor
show.overview: Tom Kirkman, a low-level cabinet member is suddenly appointed President of the United States after a catastrophic attack during the State of the Union kills everyone above him in the Presidential line of succession.
